about_the_game:
Overview:

  • Embark on an adventure across a fantasy world to recover the four Elemental Crystals, and use their power to attempt to locate the rumored fifth crystal, known as the Crystal of Light!
  • Multiple towns and dungeons to explore!
  • Solve puzzles and avoid traps on the path to the Elemental Crystals!
  • Discover new environmental biomes and methods of travel across multiple continents!
  • 240 weapons, 360 armors, and many accessories!

Gameplay:

  • Adventure with a party of 8 playable characters, each with their own weapons and unique abilities!
  • Discover and target enemy weaknesses to stun the enemy and Break through their defenses!
  • Use Boost Points acquired during battle to increase the number of attacks or the strength of spells that a character uses during their turn!
  • Be ready for any encounter by spending Ability Points earned from defeating enemies to learn new abilities!
  • Consumable items feel impactful (including 72 craftable potions!), and are plentiful enough that you should never feel like you need to save them for the right moment!
  • Switch inactive party members into battle during any party member's turn... mid-combat!
  • Battles with normal enemies can always be escaped from, avoiding the need to battle every enemy when you'd rather explore.
  • Auto Battle can be enabled for players looking for a more casual experience.
